item.title: Gradle
item.description: Log test events test { testLogging { events "PASSED", "SKIPPED", "FAILED", "STANDARD_OUT", "STANDARD_ERROR" } } Build a subproject from root level ./gradlew :<project name 1>:<action 1> :<project name 2>:<action 2>
